item.title: Logo Cup
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Warm hands and hearts with a custom mug that’s personalised with special photos, messages or designs.

The post Logo Cup appeared first on Purr Hut.
item.content:encoded:
Add a smile to morning coffee, afternoon tea or evening hot chocolate.

  • 325 ml size
  • Durable ceramic mug
  • 8 colour options for handle & interior
  • Vivid, full-colour photo printing

Ready to brighten up your beverages? Now you can design a mug that showcases a special message, favourite photo or business logo. Our durable ceramic printed mugs come in a classic white shade with options to choose a fun colour for your handle and interior.

To start creating your personalised mugs, explore our gallery of fully customisable design options. Once you’ve found a favourite photo mug, make it yours by adding your custom details and choosing the options that work best for you. We’ll take care of the rest, using our high-quality printing to create a personalised cup that will look great and make your loved ones smile.

The post Logo Cup appeared first on Purr Hut.

item.title: Designed shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Jazz up your next event with personalised men’s T-shirts. Customised with our vibrant colour printing technology. Matching products also available for women and kids.

The post Designed shirt appeared first on Purr Hut.
item.content:encoded:
Create matching clothing that feels good and looks great.

  • 100 % cotton material
  • Jersey knit
  • Tear-away label
  • Back printing available
  • Also available in women’s and kids’ styles

Decoration:Full-Colour Print (Direct-to-Garment)

Care Instructions: Machine wash at 40° C. Do not bleach, tumble dry or dry clean.

A tee for any occasion
Dress up your next event, giveaway or party with the Gildan® Men’s T-shirt. It offers a popular and effective way to create a consistent, can’t-miss look. And with a variety of sizes and colour options, you can tailor your design to your unique taste and style.

Interactive design studio
Ready to create? Choose from our assortment of product options to design the right product for your needs. Then add all your custom touches – images, text and more. After that, we’ll take care of the rest, professionally printing and shipping your order.

The post Designed shirt appeared first on Purr Hut.

item.title: Cotton T-shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Available in a range of different colours, you can’t go wrong with this semi-fitted t-shirt. Perfect for everyday wear, it goes well with just about anything.

The post Cotton T-shirt appeared first on Purr Hut.
item.content:encoded:
Product Details – Unisex T-Shirt

    • Semi-fitted unisex
    • Durable fabrics 4.5 oz or 153 g
    • Material: 100% ring-spun cotton
    • Material Exceptions: Ring-spun cotton/ polyester: heather colours (35/65), sports grey (90/10)

 

More Details:

    • Pre-shrunk fabrics that won’t shrink with washing or drying
    • Taped neck and shoulders for a soft feel and clean look
    • Rolled forward shoulders give it a more comfortable fit
    • Double needle sleeves and bottom hem for a cleaner finish and more durable look
    • Direct to garment printing using water based ink for an eco friendly result

 

Care Instructions:

  • Machine wash, warm, inside out, like colours
  • Tumble dry low
  • Do not dry clean
  • Do not iron
  • Use only non-chlorine bleach

The post Cotton T-shirt appeared first on Purr Hut.

item.title: Logo Cap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
This 6-panel structured cap is all about comfort, style and fit. With an adjustable closure, it fits most head sizes. We'll stitch your logo or message in vibrant colour.

The post Logo Cap appeared first on Purr Hut.
item.content:encoded:
This 6-panel structured cap is all about comfort, style and fit. With an adjustable closure, it fits most head sizes. We’ll stitch your logo or message in vibrant colour.

  • Vista exclusive product
  • 100% brushed cotton
  • 6-panel structured
  • Adjustable strap
  • One size fits most

Care instructions: Spot-clean only. To preserve the cap shape and your design, we don’t recommend machine washing.

Stand-out embroidery
Custom text, company logos and club emblems look professional and vibrant when stitched on these caps. With a textured look that really stands out, embroidered hats are a great way to get people’s attention.

A cohesive team look
Create a consistent look for groups, teammates and colleagues. These caps make fun gifts, swag for potential customers or even part of a casual employee uniform. And with the adjustable strap, the size can be easily altered as needed.

The post Logo Cap appeared first on Purr Hut.
